title: 'F1: The Movie' Is Now Available to Stream at Home for Free
description:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

	One of th
body:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

	One of the biggest movies of the summer is now available to watch online. â€œF1: The Movieâ€ surpassed expectations with more than a $600 million worldwide box office haul. If you missed the auto-race movie when it was released in theaters in June, you can now watch it at home for free.

	â€œF1â€ in 4K Ultra HD is available to stream on Apple TV for subscribers only. Not a subscriber? You can sign up for a 7-day free trial to watch the movie, and other originals, for free.


	After the free trial is over, Apple TV goes for $12.99/month, or $99/year, to get access to hit originals, including â€œPluribus,â€ â€œSeverance,â€ â€œFor All Mankind,â€ â€œTed Lasso,â€ â€œLong Way Home,â€ â€œKillers of the Flower Moonâ€ and others.

	In addition, the summer blockbuster is available to buy digitally for $19.99 on Prime Video, Apple TV and other digital platforms. Meanwhile, â€œF1: The Movieâ€ is also available on DVD and 4K Ultra HD with prices starting at $18.68 (reg. $24.98) on Amazon.


						
			
	

					Warner Bros. Pictures
	
					

	As for the movie itself, VarietyÂ film critic Owen Gleiberman is positive, while he writes in his review, â€œthereâ€™s a certain kind of summer movie thatâ€™s so revved and ready to go, so fuel-injected with flash and talent and star power, not to mention an irresistible subject, that before the movie is barely under way you can feel yourself getting excited about being excited. â€˜F1â€™ is one of those movies.â€

	Directed by Joseph Kosinski, â€œF1â€ follows Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt), a down-on-his luck racers, who comes out of retirement to mentor Joshua Pearce (Damson Idris), a flashy, young and arrogant up-and-coming rookie driver. The unlikely pair have to put their differences aside to work together to win it all. The movie also stars Kerry Condon, Javier Bardem, Tobias Menzies and others.


	Stream â€œF1: The Movieâ€ Apple TV for free with a 7-day free trial, or buy it digitally in 4K Ultra HD for $19.99 on Prime Video or Apple TV. In the meantime, watch for the auto-racing drama the trailer, below:

schema.headline: 'F1: The Movie' Is Now Available to Stream at Home for Free

title: â€˜Order of the Sinking Starâ€™ Puzzle Adventure Game From Jonathan Blow, Arc Games Set for 2026 Launch
description: Ten years in the making, puzzle adventure game â€œOrder of the Sinking Starâ€ is set for a 2026 release on PC from Jonathan Blowâ€˜s Thekla and indie pub
body:
Ten years in the making, puzzle adventure game â€œOrder of the Sinking Starâ€ is set for a 2026 release on PC from Jonathan Blowâ€˜s Thekla and indie publisher Arc Games.

	The game hails from the creator of â€œBraidâ€ and â€œThe Witness.â€ Itâ€™s been in the works since â€œWitnessâ€ was released in 2016, Blow said. The game features more than a thousand â€œhand-craftedâ€ puzzles that are designed to converge and hundreds of hours of gameplay. 


	â€œSinking Starâ€ is designed take players â€œto a realm of curious magic, dangerous contraptions and vicious monsters,â€ per Arc Games, based in Redwood City, Calif. Players explore four distinct worlds that eventually collide and puzzle systems intertwine. The titleâ€™s release date and trailer were unveiled Dec. 11 at The Game Awards ceremony at the Peacock Theater in downtown Los Angeles.
	

	â€œâ€˜Order of the Sinking Starâ€™ is the biggest game Iâ€™ve worked on, and also the most collaborative,â€Blow said. â€œItâ€™s a kind of game design supercollider that brings together ideas from many designers to create a puzzle landscape thatâ€™s much more intricate and vast than what has come before. Weâ€™ve successfully pushed the limits of what is possible in a puzzle adventure. The game is just incredibly complex and deep, and I canâ€™t wait to show more as we move toward launch in 2026.â€

	â€œSinking Starâ€ will mark a milestone for Arc Games, according to CEO Yoon Im. 

	â€œAnnouncing â€˜Order of the Sinking Starâ€™ is a major moment for us, for Jonathan and his team â€“ itrepresents an exciting year ahead for all of us,â€ Im said. â€œItâ€™s an honor to support Jonathan to make his most ambitious project yet a reality, as we believe â€˜Order of the Sinking Starâ€™ is set to be the premier and innovative puzzle adventure of this generation. This announcement today marks just the beginning of what we have planned for a game-changing year for us next year.â€

schema.headline: â€˜Order of the Sinking Starâ€™ Puzzle Adventure Game From Jonathan Blow, Arc Games Set for 2026 Launch

title: â€˜Street Fighterâ€™ Trailer: Chun-Li, Ryu, Ken and More Are Brought to Life in New Live-Action Film
description: A teaser trailer has been released for the new â€œStreet Fighterâ€ live-action film, featuring Chun-Li, Ken, Ryu and more characters from the highly po
body:
A teaser trailer has been released for the new â€œStreet Fighterâ€ live-action film, featuring Chun-Li, Ken, Ryu and more characters from the highly popular video game franchise.

	The trailer debuted during the 2025 Game Awards, where the filmâ€™s cast took the stage to introduce the first look.


	The new â€œStreet Fighterâ€ movie is set in 1993, and, according to an official synopsis: â€œEstranged Street Fighters Ryu (Andrew Koji) and Ken Masters (Noah Centineo) are thrown back into combat when the mysterious Chun-Li (Callina Liang) recruits them for the next World Warrior Tournament: a brutal clash of fists, fate, and fury. But behind this battle royale lies a deadly conspiracy that forces them to face off against each other and the demons of their past. And if they donâ€™t, itâ€™s game over!â€
	

	In addition to Andrew Koji, Noah Centineo and Callina Liang, the cast includes Cody Rhodes as Guile, Orville Peck as Vega, 50 Cent as Balrog, Jason Momoa as Blanka, Vidyut Jammwal as Dhalsim, Oliver Richters as Zangief, Hirooki Goto as E. Honda, David Dastmalchian as M. Bison, Roman Reigns as Akuma, Andrew Schulz as Dan Hibiki, Eric AndrÃ© as Don Sauvage, Mel Jarnson as Cammy, Rayna Vallandingham as Juli and Alexander Volkanovski as Joe. 


	â€œStreet Fighterâ€ is directed by Kitao Sakurai from a screenplay by Dalan Musson. Legendary co-produced with Japanese video game developer Capcom, while Paramount Pictures is distributing the film. 

	â€œStreet Fighterâ€ hits theaters Oct. 16, 2026. 

	Watch the teaser below:

schema.headline: â€˜Street Fighterâ€™ Trailer: Chun-Li, Ryu, Ken and More Are Brought to Life in New Live-Action Film

title: â€˜Controlâ€™ Sequel Game â€˜Resonantâ€™ Set for 2026 Release From Remedy Entertainment
description: The long-awaited sequel to the critically acclaimed, multi-award-winning video game â€œControlâ€œ will debut in 2026 according to developer Remedy Enter
body:
The long-awaited sequel to the critically acclaimed, multi-award-winning video game â€œControlâ€œ will debut in 2026 according to developer Remedy Entertainment. Formerly known as Control 2 or Codename Heron, the follow-up now has an official title: â€œControl Resonant.â€Â 

	The continuation of the â€œControlâ€ universe sets players back in the same supernatural New York setting as the first. Though this time with the main protagonist is Dylan Faden, Jesse Fadenâ€™s brother who was kidnapped years ago following a series of paranormal events.Â 
	

	The game picks up as Dylanâ€™s former captors, the Federal Bureau of Control (FBC), are deploying him at the peak of a supernatural crisis to combat a mysterious cosmic entity. Per the official logline, â€œDylan must harness his new found powers to take the fight to the myriad threats overwhelming Manhattan. On the path to unlocking the full potential of his supernatural abilities Dylan will also seek out his sister, FBC Director Jesse Faden, as he struggles to comprehend and contain the dangers that have spilled beyond the confines of the Oldest House to tear the world apart.â€ â€¯Â Â 

	News of the much-anticipated followup game was announced out of The Game Awards Thursday and comes nearly seven years after â€œControlâ€ was first released.

	The game will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and Mac via Steam and the App Store.Â Annapurna Pictures are co-financing and co-producing â€œControl Resonantâ€ as part of a strategic partnership with Remedy Entertainment, who will self-publish.Â 
	

	A cult-classic hit, â€œControlâ€ sold more than 2 million copies in the first 15 months following its debut. As of August, lifetime sales for â€œControlâ€ have since exceeded 5 million copies, Remedy announced.Â 

	â€œâ€™Control Resonantâ€™ pushes our paranatural action RPG series into an expansive, reality-warping playground of choice, power, and consequence,â€ said Mikael Kasurinen, the creative director of the game, in a statement. â€œYou donâ€™t have to know the first game to jump into the sequel, weâ€™ve made this one easy to pick up and hard to put down. Weâ€™re pushing the scale beyond anything weâ€™ve done before, elevating combat, exploration, and storytelling into a bigger, more memorable experience. Itâ€™s ambitious, a little wild, and we canâ€™t wait for players to get lost in it.â€Â 

	Watch the â€œControl Resonantâ€ announcement trailer below.Â

schema.headline: â€˜Controlâ€™ Sequel Game â€˜Resonantâ€™ Set for 2026 Release From Remedy Entertainment

title: â€˜Diablo IVâ€™ Paladin Expansion, New â€˜Divinityâ€™ Game, Lenny Kravitz as â€˜007 First Lightâ€™ Bond Villain and More Reveals From 2025 Game Awards
description: Blizzard gave â€œDiabloâ€ franchise fans what theyâ€™ve all been waiting years for Thursday during The 2025 Game Awards: the addition of the Paladin clas
body:
Blizzard gave â€œDiabloâ€ franchise fans what theyâ€™ve all been waiting years for Thursday during The 2025 Game Awards: the addition of the Paladin class to â€œDiablo IV,â€ followed by the upcoming release of â€œLord of Hatredâ€ expansion next April.

	Per the developerâ€™s description for the Paladin: â€œThe Paladin is Sanctuaryâ€™s quintessential holy warrior: a sword-and-shield champion empowered not only by faith, but by the Light itself. More than mere armored knights, Paladins are forged as holy conduits. When their unwavering devotion joins with the Light, the two become an unstoppable force against the darkness.Â Built on belovedÂ mechanics that have shaped the Paladin identity, the class brings forth iconic abilities withÂ fresh, new skills. Classic skills like Auras, Blessed Hammer, Blessed Shield, and Zeal return with a revitalized feel that blends Diablo II nostalgia with the visceral combat and grounded visual style of Diablo IV. Where Crusaders embody martial might, the Paladin leans fully into divine power.â€
	

	But Blizzard was far from the only video game developer to make a big splash with an announcement during The Game Awards, where many a new title, release date reveal and new teaser debuted. See more announcements from the 2025 Game Awards below.

	
		HIGHGUARD 	

	Wild Entertainment has unveiled â€œHighguard,â€ a free-to-play PvP raid shooter launching Jan. 26, 2026.

	An official description reads, â€œPlayers will ride, fight, and raid as Wardens, arcane gunslingers sent to fight for control of a mythical continent. Battle rival warden crews for control of the Shieldbreaker, then break into and destroy the enemy base to secure victory in this all-new breed of shooter.â€ 
	

	Watch the trailer below. 



	
		BRADLEY THE BADGER 	

	Day 4 Night Studios announced that â€œBradley the Badger,â€ an action-adventure game with a fourth-wall-breaking narrative, is currently in development for PC via Steam. Evan Peters (â€œAmerican Horror Story,â€ â€œX-Men: Days of Future Pastâ€) provides the voice and live-action performance for Bradley.

	Watch the trailer below. 



	
		EXODUS 	

	Wizards of the Coast and Archetype Entertainment have released a new trailer for â€œExodus,â€ providing the most detailed look yet at Jun Aslan â€” the next hero of the sci-fi RPG. According to an official description, the trailer â€œdives deeper into Junâ€™s origins as a descendant of a legendary Traveler dynasty, revealing the extraordinary abilities hidden beneath his humble beginnings. Fans also get another glimpse of the enigmatic C.C. Orlev, portrayed by Academy Awardâ€“winning actor Matthew McConaughey in his first-ever video game role.â€

	Watch the trailer below. 



	
		WARLOCK: DUNGEONS & DRAGONS 	

	â€œWarlock: Dungeons & Dragons,â€ developed by Invoke Studios, is a single-player, third-person action-adventure that takes players into a dark-fantasy open world inspired by â€œDungeons & Dragons.â€ â€œThe game places players in the role of Kaatri, a veteran warrior who makes a pact to wield otherworldly magic against dark powers,â€ according to a press release. 

	â€œWarlockâ€ is currently in development for PC, PlayStation 5 and Xbox. Additional details, including the gameplay debut, will be unveiled in summer 2026, with a planned launch the following year.

	Watch the teaser for â€œWarlock: Dungeons & Dragonsâ€ below. 



	
		INVINCIBLE VS	

	â€œInvincible VS,â€ a tournament-quality superhero 3v3 tag fighting game that allows players to become a superhero in the bloodiest fight in the universe, will launch for Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5 and PC on April 30, 2026.

	Quarter Up, Skybound Entertainmentâ€™s first in-house game development studio, also revealed an all-new character named Ella Mental, who will join the â€œInvincible VSâ€ roster. The character is created by â€œInvincibleâ€ co-creators Robert Kirkman and Cory Walker and voiced by rapper Tierra Whack. 
	

	Watch the trailer below. 




	From Larian Studios, â€œDivinityâ€ is described as a game set in the world of Rivellon. Per the developers, â€œWhileÂ DivinityÂ is a brand new game that doesnâ€™t require experience with previous Larian titles, those whoâ€™ve playedÂ Divinity: Original Sin andÂ Divinity: Original Sin 2 will be able to enjoy greater understanding and continuity.â€

	Watch the teaser for â€œDivinityâ€ below.



	
		007 FIRST LIGHT	

	Also during the show, IO Interactive revealed Lenny Kravitz is playing a new villain in its upcoming James Bond game â€œ007 First Light.â€ Kravitz took the stage himself to tease the project, in which he will play Bawma, described as â€œthe unpredictable and charismatic ruler of Africaâ€™s largest black-market hub.â€

	The game is set to release on March 27, 2026, for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox ROG Ally X, Xbox ROG Ally, Nintendo Switch 2 and PC. 

	Watch the â€œ007 First Lightâ€ teaser featuring Kravitz below.

schema.headline: â€˜Diablo IVâ€™ Paladin Expansion, New â€˜Divinityâ€™ Game, Lenny Kravitz as â€˜007 First Lightâ€™ Bond Villain and More Reveals From 2025 Game Awards

title: Bandai Namco Entertainment CEO on A24â€™s â€˜Elden Ringâ€™ Movie, Big â€˜Ace Combat 8â€™ Reveal and Hitting a Quicker Game Output Strategy (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Bandai Namco Entertainment announced the next installment in its beloved flight-shooter franchise â€œAce Combatâ€ Thursday to much fanfare during the 2
body:
Bandai Namco Entertainment announced the next installment in its beloved flight-shooter franchise â€œAce Combatâ€ Thursday to much fanfare during the 2025 Game Awards.

	Titled â€œAce Combat 8: Wings of Theve,â€ the game takes place after the events of â€œAce Combat 7â€ and before â€œAce Combat 3.â€ The title will debut in 2026 across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X and S and for PC via Steam.

	Before the show, Bandai Namco Entertainment CEO Nao Udagawa gave Variety a sneak peek at the new game, â€œAce Combat 8: Wings of Theve,â€ and some updates on A24â€™s upcoming â€œElden Ringâ€ movie (Disney vet Peter Rice has joined the project) and her overall strategy since taking the helm at the Bandai video game studio.
	

	â€œThe graphics are something that we really, really leaned into heavy for â€˜Ace Combat 8â€™ and visual expression of the sky itself,â€ Udagawa said. â€œI think of how the clouds are shown and rendered â€” I would get different development updates and the developer would show me what the progress is, and every time, wow the sky and the clouds, itâ€™s so amazing, and how it ties into the weather change as well. So I think thatâ€™s something the fans are going to really And it is a franchise IP, so certainly the gameplay, I think the fans can know what to expect, so keeping everything that worked really well, but weâ€™re really adding value in the story and the narrative and the sort of cinematic presentation of how itâ€™s delivered. Itâ€™s gonna feel like this epic movie that youâ€™ll want to see on a big screen.â€



	

					Bandai Namco Entertainment
									Bandai Namco Entertainment
	



	Per Bandai Namcoâ€™s description for â€œAce Combat 8,â€ â€œYouâ€™re a fighter pilot, adrift at sea in a rescue boat until the outdated aircraft carrier, Endurance, pulls you aboard. Your homelandâ€™s navy is shattered. The aging vessel, its decks crowded with refugees, has already retreated far from the front lines. Itâ€™s July 2029. The Federation of Central Usea (FCU) has fallen under a lightning invasion by the Republic of Sotoa. Most of the nation is occupied, the military is scattered, and the Endurance is just one fragment of what remains. On this ship, youâ€™re given a single name: â€œWings of Theve.â€ A legendary ace, a symbol of hope, a name tied to Theve, the FCU capital. But that legend was a lie, mere propagandaâ€”a story to keep morale alive. Now, you must carry that name and take to the skies again. With three new comrades at your side, fight to reclaim your lost homeland.â€
	

	For development on the new game, Bandai Namco Entertainment launched new studio Bandai Namco Aces, so that the â€œAce Combatâ€ franchise team could operate as their own business with one targeted IP focus.



	

	



	â€œOne thing that Iâ€™m looking at right now is really the speed and cycles of development that we have,â€ Udagawa (who has retained her Chief Pac-Man Officer title since being promoted to the companyâ€™s overall CEO in 2021) said about her strategy for Bandai Namcoâ€™s game studios. â€œI think itâ€™s great that weâ€™re developing internally and having these discussions to improve the quality of the experience, but at the end of the day, until something reaches the market, the fans arenâ€™t going to be able to get their hands on it. So translating all of these discussions and healthy development into output quicker is something that Iâ€™m looking at while maintaining the quality.â€

	Back in the spring, Bandai Namco Entertainment revealed it is working on a film adaptation of its â€œElden Ringâ€ game franchise with A24 and director Alex Garland. Little has been said about the project since, but Udagawa can now share the Hollywood vet Peter Rice has joined the project.

	â€œDevelopment right now is steady in terms of the project at the moment and catch, yeah, so we have A24 helming up the project with Alex Garland and Peter Rice â€” a lot of very well-known names and heavy hitters in the film industry,â€ Udagawa said. â€œSo weâ€™re very excited right now about how itâ€™s going to shape up. But I think thatâ€™s kind of where the development and pre-production is.â€

	As for what aspect of the â€œElden Ringâ€ franchise the movie will focus on, Udagawa can only reveal that the focus for her is on pleasing fans.

	â€œOur first priority is really the â€˜Elden Ringâ€™ fans, so the fans who have supported the franchise for so long, making it sure that they feel like itâ€™s a great movie and a great experience,â€ Udagawa said. â€œAnd for those who have perhaps not been exposed to the game yet and have seen the film, for them, maybe [thinking,] Iâ€™ll try the game to see the world and the perspective from multiple angles and experience it that way.â€

	Watch the teaser for â€œAce Combat 8: Wings of Theveâ€ in the video below.

schema.headline: Bandai Namco Entertainment CEO on A24â€™s â€˜Elden Ringâ€™ Movie, Big â€˜Ace Combat 8â€™ Reveal and Hitting a Quicker Game Output Strategy (EXCLUSIVE)

title: â€˜Matlockâ€™ Boss on Making â€˜Creative Changesâ€™ to Write Out David Del Rio After Firing and Leaning Into â€˜Joyâ€™ in the Second Half of Season 2
description:
â€œMatlockâ€ is undergoing some changes. 

	In early October, David Del Rio, who portrays associate Billy Martinez, was removed from the set and fired
body:
â€œMatlockâ€ is undergoing some changes. 

	In early October, David Del Rio, who portrays associate Billy Martinez, was removed from the set and fired after a sexual assault allegation. Season 2 was already in production when the incident occurred, and Del Rio had already filmed seven episodes. â€œPrior Bad Acts,â€ which aired on Dec. 4, marked his final appearance, showrunner Jennie Snyder Urman confirms to Variety.


	That episode ended with Billy telling his pregnant girlfriend, â€œI do want to get married,â€ an odd-sounding line that appeared to have been mashed together later. While Snyder Urman didnâ€™t confirm that was the case, she said, â€œIâ€™ll just say there were creative changes that we had to make, and we made them. Weâ€™re ending up in a different place than what our plans were, but we really stopped and tried to think about how we can have an exit that makes sense in the world of our show and for the character.â€
	

	During the Dec. 11 midseason finale, Sarah (Leah Lewis) reveals Billy has taken a personal day from work, then later learns his pregnant girlfriend has had a miscarriage. â€œHis exit will be explained in the course of the next two episodes, and it is really in line with the character and in line with whatâ€™s happening with the firm at large,â€ Snyder Urman says. â€œWe want to remain true to the character.â€

	While Snyder Urman said sheâ€™s â€œnot able to discuss the eventsâ€ surrounding the allegations made against Del Rio that led to his firing, she added: â€œWe just sort of plugged in and kept moving forward. Weâ€™re just all happy to be back, and focused on the work. I think thatâ€™s the thing â€” we want the show to be great. We want it to be joyful for the audience to watch.â€
	

	Though Lewis has never confirmed her involvement with the allegations, after the news broke that Del Rio had been fired, she shared a message via Instagram in which she wrote, â€œMom is here, weâ€™re moving forward in love and strength. Iâ€™m in good hands. Thank you to everybody for any kind of support and care. Truly, weâ€™re moving forward in strength. Key word, strength. Please, let that be the takeaway.â€ Del Rioâ€™s wife, in turn, posted and deleted a photo of her and her own mom with text that read, â€œMom is here. Weâ€™re moving forward in love and strength after what Leah did to our family. Thank you all for the love and support!â€

	On the show, Lewisâ€™ character is facing a tough road ahead in Season 2, having been she was removed from Olympiaâ€™s (Skye P. Marshall) team during the midseason finale after lying to her boss. Plus, the merger is moving full steam ahead, which means no oneâ€™s jobs are safe. One positive note? Olympia and Matty (Kathy Bates) are finally back on the same team again.

	â€œThat relationship is just everything to me,â€ Snyder Urman said of Matty and Olympia. â€œIf I could headline the back half of the season, itâ€™s joy, because we have so much fun coming in with some new characters, some returning, and then we start flipping cards left and right. Thereâ€™s a certain amount of joy that that brings, in terms of telling the story and getting answers. And then we get to have Matty and Olympia working together â€” this intergenerational friendship that was unexpected, but means everything to them both. They look at all these obstacles, but work on them together, which to me is a relief, because I hate writing them in conflict.â€

	Plus, two new characters will be introduced in the back half of Season 2:Â Sarah Wright Olsen as Gwen, an efficiency expert analyzing the firm; and Henry Haber as Hunter, a younger associate and â€œtotal bro.â€

	â€œMatlockâ€ returns to CBS with new episodes on Thursday, Feb. 26.

schema.headline: â€˜Matlockâ€™ Boss on Making â€˜Creative Changesâ€™ to Write Out David Del Rio After Firing and Leaning Into â€˜Joyâ€™ in the Second Half of Season 2

title: How to Stream Taylor Swift's Eras Tour Doc Online
description:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

	The â€œEnd
body:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, Variety may receive an affiliate commission.

	The â€œEnd of an Eraâ€ is finally here. Taylor Swiftâ€˜s six-part docuseries premieres on Disney+ at 12 a.m PT/ 3 a.m. ET on Friday, Dec. 12. The series will be accompanied by a new concert film shot at her final show in Vancouver, BC. 

	The series is an intimate look at Swiftâ€™s life during the second leg of her record-breaking Eras Tour, including a behind-the-scenes look at her high-wattage relationship with her now fiancÃ©, Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, and moments with tour opening acts Gracie Abrams and Sabrina Carpenter and guests Ed Sheeran and Florence Welch. The first two of the six episodes will be available to stream tonight, with two more episodes released weekly for the next two weeks.
	

	â€œIâ€™m very aware of mysterious forces at play that I will never have any control of,â€ Swift says in a trailer for the doc. â€œThis show created a bonding experience for like 70,000 people all at once. Thereâ€™s something very special about that.â€

	The docuseries also takes viewers inside Swiftâ€™s planning process for each concertâ€™s surprise song section. At the end of the trailer, Swift explains to her mom: â€œSo it goes â€˜New Yearâ€™s Dayâ€™ verse and chorus, â€˜Manuscriptâ€™ bridge into â€˜Long Liveâ€™ bridge, into the down verse of â€˜Long Live,â€™ into â€˜hold onto the memories they will hold onto you,â€™ into â€˜Long Liveâ€™ chorus but slow it down to half-time, â€˜New Yearâ€™s Dayâ€™ chords underneath it, into the last verse of â€˜The Manuscript.â€™â€

	The concert film bows at the same time as those first two docuseries installments. It will mark the first time fans have gotten a chance to see the material that was added to the Eras Tour from the â€œTortured Poets Departmentâ€ on the big screen. Her earlier â€œEras Tourâ€ theatrical concert film (which also eventually made its way to Disney+) was released before that album came out or songs from it were added to the tour set list.
	

	Stream Swiftâ€™s â€œEnd of an Eraâ€ docuseries and concert film on Disney+.

schema.headline: How to Stream Taylor Swift's Eras Tour Doc Online

title: New Star Wars Video Game â€˜Fate of the Old Republicâ€™ Set From Lucasfilm, â€˜Mass Effectâ€™ Director
description:
A new Star Wars video game, â€œFate of the Old Republic,â€ was announced Thursday during the 2025 Game Awards.

	Arcanaut Studios unveiled a teaser tra
body:
A new Star Wars video game, â€œFate of the Old Republic,â€ was announced Thursday during the 2025 Game Awards.

	Arcanaut Studios unveiled a teaser trailer of the video game live during this yearâ€™s ceremony. According to an official description, â€œâ€˜Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republicâ€˜Â is a narrative-driven single-player action RPG where you step into the role of a Force user on a journey through a galaxy on the edge of rebirth.â€


	Developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games, the project will be led by â€œMass Effectâ€ trilogy director Casey Hudson, who serves as game director at Arcanaut Studios.
	

	â€œWorking onÂ â€˜Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republicâ€™Â was one of the defining experiences of my career,â€ Hudson in a statement. â€œWithÂ â€˜Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic,â€™ weâ€™re telling a completely new and different story with everything weâ€™ve learned since â€“ crafting an adventure about choice, destiny, and the timeless struggle between light and dark. Itâ€™s a dream come true to once again collaborate with Lucasfilm Games.â€

	â€œWe look for partners who have the drive and the leadership to build something groundbreaking, and thatâ€™s what we see in Casey,â€ said Jay Ong, head of Disney Games Group. â€œUnder Caseyâ€™s direction, Arcanaut Studios is assembling a team with a deep passion for storytelling and building immersive worlds. Their vision forÂ â€˜Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republicâ€™Â is exactly the kind of ambitious, high-quality experience we want to deliver for our players.â€

	â€œThe Old Republic era is a rich and beloved part of the Star Warsâ„¢ galaxy, and we are thrilled to be exploring a fresh story that weâ€™ve never seen before inÂ â€˜Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic,â€™â€ added Douglas Reilly, VP and GM of Lucasfilm Games. â€œArcanaut Studios shares our enthusiasm for the galaxy far, far away, and their plan for this new narrative is inspiring. We believe fans will be delighted by the journey that awaits them, and we canâ€™t wait to share more.â€
	

	â€œStar Wars: Fate of the Old Republicâ€Â is in early development for PC and consoles. 

	Watch a first look at the game in the video below.

schema.headline: New Star Wars Video Game â€˜Fate of the Old Republicâ€™ Set From Lucasfilm, â€˜Mass Effectâ€™ Director

title: Amazon Unveils â€˜Tomb Raider: Catalystâ€™ Video Game First Look and 2027 Release; Sets Remake of Original Lara Croft Game for 2026
description: Amazon Game Studios and Crystal Dynamics revealed a first look at their highly anticipated new â€œTomb Raiderâ€ game Thursday during The Game Awards â€”
body:
Amazon Game Studios and Crystal Dynamics revealed a first look at their highly anticipated new â€œTomb Raiderâ€ game Thursday during The Game Awards â€” and announced a remake of the original 1996 â€œTomb Raiderâ€ title will be launching next year.

	Launching in 2027, â€œTomb Raider: Catalystâ€ is a new title from Amazon, which will be preceded by reimagining â€œTomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantisâ€ next year. Actress Alix Wilton Regan is the voice and motion-capture star portraying Lara Croft in both games. (â€œDragon Age: Inquisition,â€ â€œCyberpunk 2077â€ and â€œMass Effect 3â€).
	

	Per Amazon Game Studios and Crystal Dynamicsâ€™ description for â€œCatalyst,â€ the game â€œmarks a bold direction for the series as Lara Croft embarks on a new adventure across Northern India.â€ â€œTomb Raider: Catalyst is set in the wake of a mythical cataclysm that has unleashed ancient secrets and awakened the mysterious forces that guard them. When the most notorious treasure hunters from around the world descend on the region, Lara races to uncover the truth buried beneath the fractured landscape and stop those who would use its power for their own gain. As the ancient world collides with the present, Lara must decide who to trust among rivals and allies to prevent a catastrophe and protect a secret that could reshape the future.â€


	â€œTomb Raider: Catalystâ€ is set to launch in 2027 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

	Before â€œCatalystâ€ releases, Amazon Game Studios, Crystal Dynamics and Flying Wild Hog will launch â€œTomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis,â€ which is described as â€œa modern reimagining of Lara Croftâ€™s genre-defining 1996 debut.â€ 
	

	â€œDeveloped in partnership between Crystal Dynamics and Flying Wild Hog, the game features stunning visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, modern game design, and new surprises that honor the spirit and atmosphere of the original game,â€ Amazon said in a press release announcing the game Thursday during The Game Awards. â€œAs Lara Croft, players will harness their wits and athleticism to explore exotic locations lost to time, traverse treacherous landscapes, solve deadly contraptions, and face lethal predators in their quest for the scattered pieces of the Scionâ€”an artifact of immeasurable power.â€

	â€œTomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantisâ€ will launch in 2026 across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

	Both games are being developed as Amazon is also prepping a new live-action â€œTomb Raiderâ€ TV series starring Sophie Turner as Lara Croft.

	â€œThe two games we announced at The Game Awards and the TV series from Amazon MGM Studios are being developed in parallel; they share a core DNA but each project is making choices that are correct for its medium,â€ Crystal Dynamics head of studio Scot Amos told Variety. â€œFor now, weâ€™re focused on the games and will have more details to share on Legacy of Atlantis and Catalyst next year.â€

	Regarding the development timeline for the two games, Amos said: â€œWe have two parallel and powerful development teams inside of Fellowship Entertainment, complementing each other yet each owning their respective game, whether thatâ€™s Catalyst or Legacy of Atlantis. We are connected by shared technologies and gameplay systems where it makes sense, and by a shared leadership group who oversees the creative alignment and ensures all things are within the Tomb Raider canon. Our partnership with Flying Wild Hog on Legacy of Atlantis has been incredibleâ€”they truly feel like a parallel Crystal Dynamics team. This development approach means Legacy of Atlantis can arrive in 2026 to celebrate that meaningful 30th anniversary milestone, while Catalyst follows in 2027 with the scope and ambition that game requires.â€

	Watch the teasers for both games below.

schema.headline: Amazon Unveils â€˜Tomb Raider: Catalystâ€™ Video Game First Look and 2027 Release; Sets Remake of Original Lara Croft Game for 2026

title: Sydney Sweeney Reveals Truth About Her Boobs During Lie-Detector Test

          Sydney Sweeney is finally addressing the age-old question thatâ€™s been on everyoneâ€™s lips since she burst onto the scene ... and yep, itâ€™s exactly what you think itâ€™s about. ğŸ’
      
    
          The actress sat down for Vanity Fairâ€™s lie-detector test while promoting her new flick, "The Housemaid" -- and thatâ€™s when co-star Amanda Seyfried asked if her boobs are real and if sheâ€™d ever had any work done on 'em.
      

          Sydney didnâ€™t miss a beat -- she said "yes" to the first question, and added she hasnâ€™t had work done anywhere ... and the polygraph administrator backed her up, confirming she was telling the truth.
      
    
          As you know, Sydneyâ€™s always been unapologetically body confident ... rocking skintight fits that proudly highlight the girls.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          But she hasnâ€™t always felt that way ... she told Glamour UK last year she actually considered a reduction at 18 'cause she felt uncomfortable with how big they were -- until her mom talked her out of it.
      
    
          Thank God she didn't ... Hollywood wouldâ€™ve lost two of its biggest stars!

title: Scott Weiland's Son Noah Says He'd Rather Be Dead Than Live as His Dad Did
description:
Scott Weiland
                          Son Posts Alarming Message Online
body:
Scott Weiland
                          Son Posts Alarming Message Online
                          ... References Dad's Troubled Life
                      
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Scott Weiland's son is posting some worrying messages to Instagram ... claiming he'd rather be dead than live his life as his father did.
      
    
          Noah Weiland posted to his Instagram story Thursday afternoon ... sharing a text post written on a blurry gray background which begins, "I'd rather be DEAD" -- a pretty drastic statement, though he tries to qualify it by explaining he'd rather be dead than live as his dad did.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          He goes on, "Regardless of all this, it's been a long journey. Can't wait to see him again & thank you for all your support along the way. Won't ever forget this."
      

          The post is eerie ... reading like the beginnings of a suicide note -- though we don't know for sure what Noah means by any of it.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          As you may know ... Scott was found dead on a tour bus in Minnesota in 2015. Authorities later determined he died from an overdose of cocaine, MDMA -- a type of old school Ecstasy -- and alcohol.
      
    
          Noah was just a teenager when Scott passed away ... and he's dealt with similar demons as his father. He was kicked out of the band, Suspect208, due to drug use. Weiland told iHeartRadio the ousting from the group exacerbated his drug problem.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          We've reached out to Noah about his post ... so far, no word back.
      
    
          If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, help is available. Call or text 988 or chat 988lifeline.org.
      
      
              
            
              Related articles
            
        
              
          
                          
                Scott Weiland

                Music

schema.headline: Scott Weiland's Son Noah Says He'd Rather Be Dead Than Live as His Dad Did

title: Lili Reinhart Reveals Endometriosis Diagnosis, Undergoes Surgery
description:
Lili Reinhart
                          Docs Brushed Off My Pain ...
                          It
body:
Lili Reinhart
                          Docs Brushed Off My Pain ...
                          It Was Endometriosis All Along!!!
                      
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          Lili Reinhartâ€™s keeping it real ... revealing she was finally told she has endometriosis after undergoing surgery -- a hard-won answer that came only after years of doctors brushing her off.
      
    
          In an IG post Thursday, the actress shared pics from the hospital after her laparoscopic surgery ... explaining sheâ€™d seen multiple urologists, gynecologists, and hit up three hospitals, yet not one doctor brought up endometriosis. Instead, she was told last year she had interstitial cystitis -- and there was no cure.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          It wasnâ€™t until she saw two different pelvic floor therapists that endometriosis was even floated as a possible cause of her pain -- which pushed her to demand an MRI -- finally leading to the real diagnosis.
      

                  
          
                          
                
                                  
      
    
          She says sheâ€™s just glad she listened to her gut ... adding with endometriosis, thereâ€™s usually a massive 4â€“11 year gap between symptoms and actually getting a surgical diagnosis. Wild.
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    IG / lilireinhart
          
    
          Lili opened up earlier this year about battling an unexplained illness, but now she finally has answers ... and sheâ€™s already using her platform to speak up for other women dealing with the same struggle -- all while keeping it cute from the hospital bed on IG, lip gloss poppin' and everything!

title: Charlie Kirk Murder Suspect Tyler Robinson Makes First In-Person Court Appearance
description:
Charlie Kirk Murder Suspect
                          Tyler Robinson Seen In Court For First Time
body:
Charlie Kirk Murder Suspect
                          Tyler Robinson Seen In Court For First Time
                      
                  
                                                                        Published 
                              
                December 11, 2025
                
                            11:18 AM PST
                                                                      |
                                                                Updated 
                                  December 11, 2025
                                2:57 PM PST
                                    
      
    
      
        
                    
                  
      
                    KSL News Utah
          
    
          Tyler Robinson -- the 22-year-old man who prosecutors say murdered Charlie Kirk -- made his first in-person court appearance Thursday.
      
    
          Robinson's father, mother and brother were present as both sides were able to come to an agreement with regard to the degree of media access granted throughout the ongoing court proceedings.
      

                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Robinson previously appeared in court a few days after the shooting, via video call. Today, he sat in the Provo, Utah courtroom wearing street clothes ... a privilege his lawyers fought for in a motion to ditch the jail garb.
      
    
          As you know, Kirk was shot and killed on the Utah Valley University campus in Orem, UT in September ... and, after an extensive manhunt, Robinson turned himself in to authorities.
      
    
                  
          
                          
                
                  
      
    
          Robinson allegedly confessed to the crime to his father, who then told a youth pastor who happens to work with the U.S. Marshals Service. Robinson ultimately surrendered at Utah's Washington County Sheriff's Office, around 10 PM on Sept. 11, the day after the shooting.
      
    
          Utah prosecutors charged Robinson with aggravated murder, felony discharge of a firearm causing serious bodily injury, and obstruction of justice.
      
    
          The aggravated murder charge could get him the death penalty if convicted.
